You were just recently coming to out of the land of unconsciousness when you realize that the place you were in was that of a giant bedroom.

Judging from your size you were probably about 2 inches tall, making it a difficult task to simply move about the area, any further thoughts was disturbed when you heard foot steps as the ground shook, thinking fast, you decide to run underneath the bed for safety from whoever this person may be, your memories is a bit blank on what was going on before you shrank.

But as you went under the bed, you could see a woman's barefeet walking into view as you could hear her sigh as she shifted around a bit on her feet, before you then hear her speak.
11111.title: Android 18 is aware of me she shrunk me

11112.content:
You awaken on a soft and hairy surface. This wasn't your bed, its someone's carpet! You leaped onto your feet to discover that you've shrunk! You looked above you, a coffee table stood above you. To your left, was what appears to be a violet couch.

"At least I know I'm in a living room." You proclaimed. " But who's living room?"

As if the universe came to answer your question, the ground began to shake. You look around frantically, trying to pinpoint where it was coming from. After a few seconds, you saw who it was, Android 18. Meaning you were somehow teleported in the world of Dragon Ball Z! You were simply in awe. You were face to face with one of the hottest girls in the entire series!

Your focused snapped back into reality as you saw 18 sat down on the couch, crossing her legs with a bowl of popcorn next to her. From her appearance, It must be after the Cell saga. She was wearing white jeans and a blue sweater.

You had to get her help, so you began your journey upward. You started at her feet. They weren't a problem for awhile until 18 started to scratch her foot with the other one. You were dragged back and forth on her foot, becoming completely oblivious to the robotic goddess. After a few seconds, she stopped and placed her foot back on the ground. You were surprised that you survived it without a scratch.

You continued your climb up her ankle and were faced with an opening in her pants.

What do you do?

A: You decided to crawl on the outside of her pants. You could climb to her ear or take a possible unaware vore route.

B: You decided to crawl inside her pants. This will lead to her panties and inside her shirt.

1151.title: Akame Ga Kill

11511.content:
"This new Imperial Arms of Leone's will provide a unique advantage..." Najenda said at a morning meeting at Nightraid's hideout. Leone smirked cockily as she admired the otherwise unremarkable bracelet on her arm. "Yep! Our enemies won't expect a thing...and by the time they've figured it out I'll have squashed em'!" Leone laughed.

"You sure got lucky with that find, big sis." Tatsumi said as he sipped his tea. "Oh don't worry, it shrinks things too...so I can play with you anytime I want!" Leone cooed, causing Tatsumi to spit out his tea in shock. "W-what!?"

"Sigh...lucky." Lubbock muttered. "Don't worry, I'm sure if you annoy her enough she'll shrink you down too, Lub." Mine rolled her eyes. "Really?" Lubbock asked, "Sure...but don't cry when she just stomps ya like a bug." Mine snickered.

Meanwhile, outside the Nightraid hideout a young man was walking home from school with a bookbag slung over his shoulder....at least that's what he last remembered. He sat up wearily, holding his head and gritting his teeth in pain at the headache he suddenly got.

This boy's name was Jacob and he was very far from home. "Ugh...where am I? I don't remember wandering into the woods..." Pulling out his phone, he saw that he wasn't connected to wifi and when he tried to dial a number, nothing happened.

"What the hell? I mean I know I'm out in the woods but how come I can't even call anyone!?" He blurted and stood up. He walked forward with his bag in hand and tripped over one of Lubbock's trip wires.

Instantly inside the hideout Cross Tail alerted Lubbock and the others. "Looks like something set off my trap. But it's waaay too close to the hideout...why didn't it set off the others around the perimeter?" Lubbock said aloud as everyone jumped up and rushed outside, believing they were under attack.

What they found was no warrior or sinister Imperial...but a young boy laying flat on his face wearing strange clothes. "Jeez, what's with his clothes?" Mine scoffed as she held Pumpkin at the ready.

Akame and Tatsumi had their swords ready and Lubbock stood by Najenda and Leone. "He's kinda cute...even though he's facedown in the dirt." Leone admitted.

"Who are you?" Najenda demanded as she approached. Jacob looked up and saw the strangest group of people he'd ever seen...one of whom was dressed in pink and holding the biggest gun he'd ever seen.

"Uhh...Jacob? Can ya tell me where I am-" Jacob tried to stand up and Lubbock instinctively had wires wrap around the boy's body, restraining him. "Don't move..." Lubbock warned dangerously.

Jacob stood there and fearfully squeaked: "O-Ok...."

Najenda frowned, "Leone, shrink him and take him in to be interrogated...by you."

Leone looked over the moon as she activated the bracelet and shrank the boy down to 4 inches tall. She approached, her footsteps shaking the earth beneath him as he looked up to the scantily clad, buxom giantess and screamed in terror.
11511.title: Leone

115111.content:
You looked up at the giant short haired blonde, her long brown boots were on either side of you either one big enough to stomp you to paste.

She giggled. "Alright little one." She started bending. "Let's you and I spend some time together." An evil glint appeared in her eye and a sadistic grin as her giant hand was craning down towards you.

You turned around and started sprinting. You only got a couple centimeters before the woman's giant fingers ensnared you in a fist. Your arms and legs we're trapped in her mere fingers, only your head is out. You panic trying to move your arms trying anything to get out of the massive iron grip. "L-let me out please!" You begged not liking the situation at all. The blonde woman brought her fist up slowly until you were at eye level with her yellow eyes.

Leone felt you squirming in her hand, sees the fear in your small eyes. Any other person would feel the need to tell him it would be ok, but a member of Night Raid told him what was necessary. "Quite" She said with a death like tone to her voice glaring at you.

The glare makes your hairs stand and your spine felt chills. You stopped moving and closed your eyes hoping this was a bad idea.

Tatsumi watches as the man in Leone's fist, he felt a bit of pity for the boy, he looked to young to be a threat. "I kind of feel bad for him."

Lubbock tapped his shoulder. "Don't, young or not he could be dangerous." He sees the boy in Leone's hand. "Besides.... he's so lucky!"

The younger assassin just sighed at him.

"Alright boss, I'm off to the interrogation room." Leone says with a beautiful smile.

Najenda nodded. "Make sure you get everything out of him." She told him. "No holding back."

You gulped at that, fighting not to panic and beg. Leone turned around roughly making your head recoil from the sudden motion. She walked with you wondering what was going to happen to you.

Later...

Leone entered the interrogation room with you in hand.

You looked around seeing all kinds of torture devices, tools for removing finger nails, blades for cutting, a rack for stretching limbs. You shivered, and hoped nothing in here would be used to torture you.

"Alright little man!" Leone dropped you on a table that's level with her belly button. "This'll be your new home for a while!"

You fell on your boot roughly and looked up at the buxom lady. "W-what are you going to do to me?"

Leone brought her hand under her chin with a thoughtful smile. "Don' know, usually I either beat the info out of people with my other imperial arms." She points to her belt over her black panties. The belt glowed growing Leone's hair and cat ears. Her hands and feet remained the same deciding to let her victim enjoy her beauty a little before torturing him.

You were in awe at the transformation that just transpired, her golden hair longer, cute cat ears and... is that a tail?

SLAM!

You jumped as Leon slammed her big hands on both sides of you.

"But now that your tiny." She continued with that evil cute smile. "I have a lot more options." She sees you shaking again. "You chose a bad day to get near our hideout."

"But I-" You were intercepted when her right hand grabbed you and knocked out of you.

"Enough chit-chat, time to go to work!" Leone giggled, then she rose her left arm up and took a whiff. "Ooh, hadn't shower since my last mission." She then looked to you which again made you scared. "I think we know our first torture method!"

"Wait whmph!" You were immediately pressed against her sweaty armpit, your head felt all the greasy substance, and the smell was beyond ranked. It was like a bunch of athletes wore the same gym clothes and put it in a pile. It was amplified due to your small nostrils.

Leone giggled, it tickled having your face against her pit. "Smells huh? Oh I know let's coat your whole body in there" She loosened her grip and pressed you like a sponge to her sweaty but soft skin.

Now your whole body was getting coated in pit sweat, the BO was starting to make you cry as this giant lion like girl rubs you not so gently against her pit. The only solace to this is the feeling of her silky skin, it felt nice minus all the sweat.

"Hahahaha, you ready to tell me everything you know yet?" She said still rubbing you in her pit. "Let's do it a little longer for good measure!" And to your displeasure she rubbed harder the sweat getting in your mouth, tasting salty and disgusting. It's also making your eyes water, you wonder when this'll end.
115111.title: In the pit

1151111.content:
Finally, after what felt like ages, the gigantic lioness chick pulled you out of her armpit. "Well...? Gonna tell me what I wanna know, squirt?" She asked with a smirk on her face, this was fun! You spat out salty sweat and looked up at her admittedly cute face. "I-I don't understand what you wanna know! I don't even know where I am!" you wailed.

Leone scoffed, "Ya expect me to believe you just HAPPENED to stumble on our hideout? Not likely...though I gotta know how ya didn't set off any of Lub's other traps." She gave you a bit of a squeeze, causing you to yelp in pain. "O-ok....c-can ya give me a chance to uh....explain?" You cleared your throat. Leone glared at you, "That's what I'm doin'....unless you want me to stuff ya in my other pit ya better hurry up!" Leone boomed.

"I just woke up here! I'm not a spy or whatever you think! I don't even know who you guys are!" You blurted. Leone looked skeptical, "You really expect me to believe that?"

"W-what?! It's true! I swear!" You shouted, causing Leone to snicker devilishly. "Yeah, yeah...suuure! In the meantime, my right pit is sooo lonely..." She mocked you with a pout as she passed you to her left hand and slowly and seductively raised her right arm and revealed her glistening, sweaty, BO ridden armpit to you. A waft of hot, rancid air blew into your face and caused you to retch in revulsion.

"Awwww, should'a told the truth to meee! Or...at least made up a better excuse!" She slapped you into her pit with a moist splat. She sighed as she rubbed you into the stench-ridden surface. "Now just stay right there..." She cooed as she lowered her arm over you with a wet slapping sound.
1151111.title: Continue 1

11511111.content:
Leone was giggling as she kept rubbing the young man into her sweaty pits, making squishy sounds as she did.

"Mph!"

She giggled feeling him trying to speak against her pit. "What is it more lies?"

"Mph!"

"Hmm" Leone pulled you out and rose you to her face. Her face scrunched up from the smell. "Ah! I cannot believe how rank I am! It must be the worse at your size it must be hell." She giggled.

You had the face of a boy who had been broken from this torture. Unfortunately she doesn't seem to care.

"So now will you talk?"

"Grow me back, I can prove that I-I'm not who you think I am."

"Like hell." Leone mercilessly squeezed you, causing you all sorts of pain throughout your body, she made sure not to break anything to keep you from going into shock. "I never got this far in Night Raid without keeping my guard up. Your a spy, how else could you get past our traps?" She rose her right arm. "Time for round 3!"

"My backpack! My backpack!"

She stopped with your face just in front of the glistening pit. "What?"

You stare at the shiny pit, you still smell the strong odor, not wanting to reunite with it you explain. "Just, just grow my backpack and then it'll show you that I'm not who you think I am."

"Backpack?" Leone twisted her wrist to see a strange red bag on your back. "Oh right. Why didn't I think of that?" She sweat dropped then she turned you back around. "But why don't you open it first, I'd hate to spring a trap."

Geez this woman was beyond paranoid. You nodded knowing not to deny the lioness.

She put you back on the table and stood with her arms crossed under her breasts. "Just so you know, if I find one weapon, we'll move on to something more lethal and demeaning." She gave a serious scary face. "Understand?"

You nodded, took off your bag and unzipped it. You showed that nothing happened. "See there's no trap."

Leone then slowly descended her hand upon you, for a moment you thought she was gonna grab you, you closed your eyes only to feel the bag taken from you. You reopened them to see the giant lioness holding your bag between her two fingers, her bracelet glowed and the bag grew to it's normal size, which is gigantic to you. She eyed down at you. "Ok, let's see what we have here." She put her hand in the strange bag and pulled out what looked like a book and placed it next to you. "Math, science" She looked at you with a confused look. "You some kind of scholar? Wait" She pulled one last book and it read history. She placed the book down on top of the rest then she emptied the rest of it's contents next to them. Papers, pencils, erasers and pens fell out.

You watched and kept gulping hoping that you finally cleared your name.

"What is this junk?" Leone questioned and looked at you for an answer.

"It's stuff I have for school, look that history book it'll tell you where I'm from!"

She grabbed the book and opened it. It had strange pictures of places she's never heard of, and the continents are all wrong. Yet they we're described like the madman who wrote the book actually lived there. Including historical figures she's never even heard of. "Wait what, this doesn't make any sense, so wait if this is where your from then." She stopped for a minute and looked at you for a minute.

You were hoping that she finally understood. "Yes, I had no idea how I came here so please help me."

Leone's eyes turned sparkly at you, you hoped that was a good sign. "Oh this means you could be from a whole other world! This is so cool!" She dropped her hands on either side of you. This action scared you quite a bit, she then kneeled down so she was eye level with you. "Wow I can't believe it, if you really did come from another world then it must have been an accident because no one would want to go near our forest, so wait how did you get here?" She then stopped when she sees trying to back away from her.

"What's wrong?" Leone then remembered she was torturing you just a few minutes ago. "Oh, no, look I didn't meant to I was just following orders." The lioness got defensive still seeing you back away, she then brought a hand behind you to act as a wall to keep you from going further away. "Look, I'm sorry, you were just suspicious, believe me I actually didn't like torturing you, you're pretty cute." She tried calming you down.

You blush but still wary of this giant lioness. "J-just please don't hurt me."

"Look I can make it up to you." She's never tortured an innocent person since Night Raid and now that she has she wants to make things right. "Oh I know how bout I-"
11511111.title: Evidence and Apologies.

115111111.content:
"Go clear things up with the rest of the group? I'm sure they'll wanna know who ya are and about this weird place you're from!" Leone suggested, reverting to her normal form and tossing the 'junk' back into the backpack roughly.

You gulped, "Y-You promise you guys won't uh...kill me? And when can I grow back?" you asked. Leone snickered, "Relax, no reason to now! As for growin' ya back...the boss might wanna keep you around and monitor you JUST to be safe." Leone plucked you up and tucked you, of all places, into her cleavage. "Eep! W-what are you-?!" you yelled in embarrassment, her cleavage was rather sticky with sweat...just like her pits only not as stinky.

"Oh relax, you're my new boytoy afterall!" Leone winked as she grabbed your backpack and started walking into the main area of the hideout.

Najenda was seated in an ornate chair in the room where Tatsumi first was introduced to Nightraid. Najenda, Akame, Tatsumi, Mine, and Lubbock looked up and saw Leone had come back.

"So...what did he tell y-" Akame started to ask before Mine shouted: "IS HE IN YOUR BOOBS?!"

"AAAAGH! NO FAIR!" Lubbock yelled.

Leone grinned and yanked you out of her cleavage and began nuzzling you into her cheek like a cute little animal. "Oh he's so adorable!! He told me he's from another world and he even has the proof to back it up and he's not a threat at all...are ya wittle guy?" She patted you on the head, it was hard to believe this lady was just torturing you moments ago.

"Proof...that he's from another world?" Tatsumi questioned.

"Yup!" Leone nodded. "Well..let's see it then." Najenda took a puff on her cigarette. Leone dumped the bag out once more onto the floor in front of everyone. "What is he a scholar?" Mine snarked as most of these were school supplies.

"Here, everybody take a look at this." Leone held up the textbook titled: World History.

The group of assassins passed it around and flipped through it, "Whoa, the tech in this place is waaaay more advanced than anything I've ever seen!" Tatsumi commented.

"These places....I've never seen or heard of anything like them." Akame said in awe.

"Hmph..so we've got a weirdo shrimp who just happened to land in our backyard? What do we do with him...?" Mine sneered at you, causing you to nervously quiver.

"We'll permit him to stay with us...perhaps once he grows familiar with this place we could make a valuable ally out of him...but until now he's under your care Leone...and he's not to be grown back until we know we can trust him." Najenda narrowed her uncovered eye at you.

"You got it, boss!" Leone said without argument.

"So uh....where am I exactly?" You asked dumbly. "You're in the hideout of Nightraid, a secret assassin group fighting against the Empire's tyranny." Tatsumi declared pridefully.

"....Kay..." You said shyly, kind of uncomfortable with the idea of being helpless with a bunch of killers. "Maybe we could learn some stuff from these textbooks and with shorty's help?" Lub said to Najenda.

"Not a bad idea..what is your name?" Najenda inquired of you. "J-Jacob, ma'am." You said politely, getting the feeling you didn't wanna piss this robo-armed woman off.

"Well Jacob, you won't be living here for free. You'll be assisting in chores and will tell us about your world...we'll see if we can glean anything from your world's history and battle tactics." Najenda said.

"Wait...how is he going to do chores at his size?" Tatsumi asked. "Let's see how strong...and durable he is first, then. Leone...use him as an insole!" Najenda declared suddenly.
115111111.title: Continue 1

1151111111.content:
Your eyes widened. "Wait what?!"

Tatsumi looked to Najenda. "Boss, you just had Leone interrogate him, now that we know he's actually innocent, wouldn't it be torture to do more to him?"

Mine looked to Tatsumi. "We can't take any chances, it's for the best if he get's toughen him up and see if he could be useful. Though I do think putting him in someone's boot is a little harsh."

Akame looked at the panicking man and sighed. "Boss, maybe we should take it easy on him, he's a victim of circumstance. Like many of the empire."

Lubbock looked at you and started... crying? "Sooooo lucky!"

Everyone cringed from him being jealous of being under Leone's foot. "Freak" Mine snarked.

You look around at the night raid members looking at whatever sympathy they can give and looking back up at your captor with a panicked expression.

Leone looked at you with a sympathetic expression and sighed. "Sorry Jacob, boss's orders." She grabbed you out of her cleavage.

"This is for his sake too Leone. He's seen our hideout, and cannot be allowed to leave." She narrowed her eye at you frightening you even more. "Whatever world your from, here only the strong and cunning can live. This will toughen you up."

You see no way out of this and sigh. You were then brought to Leone's golden eyes. "Don't be sad little guy I'll be gentle on my steps and I'll give you a special reward later." She then brought your tiny head to her huge lips and gave you the biggest kiss of your life.

Part of Leone regretted doing that as she tasted her own sweat. 'Gross! I'll have to bathe him before bed tonight.' But she actually liked kissing this adorable little man. She pulled him away and gave him one last wink.

You blushed and then looked down to see Leone starting to take her boot off.

"Oh boy." She put you in her cleavage and sat down. She pulled with all her might, trying to yank her foot out of her boot, the sounds were similar to a plunder being pulled. "Grr! Come off!"

You cringed as she was trying to pull that boot off, then a loud function cup sound popped. Showing her pretty and shiny looking foot. Shiny from the sweat that is. "Oh god" She then grabbed you from her cleavage and hesitantly dropped you in the sweaty boot.

You landed on the squishy insole, your hands felt the moist stank bottom, you looked up to see Leone looking down at you with a sympathetic look. "I'll make your reward extra special I promise." She then rose her foot, all you can see is the five toes heading down.

You tried to crawl as you were too tall to fit in,you felt her foot crash down on you, the crevice of her big and second biggest toe ensnared your head, while the rest of your body was underneath her foot.

Leone felt you under her foot, as bad as she felt it feels kind of good having someone under her foot. "I'll have to bathe him extra after this."

Lubbock who stopped looking sympathetic and grinder his teeth. "Why is he so lucky!" While the rest of night raid all had looks of sympathy.

"Well, I guess he's taken care of." Leone said gently pressing her foot on you feeling your tiny body beneath her mighty sole, knowing that he'll need a really good treat after this. She looked to Najenda. "So boss what's next?"
1151111111.title: Continue I

11511111111.content:
"You all should start training to level yourselves up. Meanwhile I'll be looking over these books of Jacob's." Najenda picked up the books and headed into the other room.

"So big sis, what's it feel like?" Tatsumi asked, approaching Leone. "Surprsingly good, but it'd probably feel better knowing I had an enemy under these sexy feet. Or maaybe youuu..." Leone cooed, causing Tatsumi to pale.

"No fair!" Lubbock yelled, Leone laughed. "Trust me, ya don't wanna go near these things at his size...I ain't washed since my last mission!" Leone declared somewhat proudly.

"Sooo hawwwwt!" Lubbock somehow seemed even more turned on as everyone cringed at him.

"Anyway, let's go train and hunt some danger beasts, sis!" Tatsumi said to Leone. "You read my mind, Tatsumi!" She transformed into Lionelle and both of them raced out into the surprisingly hot outdoors.

"It's weird..he feels surprisingly durable...I hope it holds up..though where his face is...is probably the worst place it could've ended up." Leone thought as she ran alongside Tatsumi and felt her feet start to heat up inside her boots.

Soon Tatsumi and Leone were facing a large group of danger beasts. As they dealt with the rather strong monsters, they bantered back and forth. "So, how's he doin'?" Tatsumi said as he dodged a claw strike from one of the reptilian creatures.

"He's soaked, but still moving and in one piece!" Leone replied as she punched one of them into a rock wall.

Meanwhile you were being coated in sweat and forced to smell the ever worsening stench of Leone's mighty toes which gripped on both sides of your head and forced your nose into her rancid toe crevice.
11511111111.title: Continue 1

115111111111.content:
Leone killed the last Danger beast with her fist and looked to Tatsumi pulling his sword out of his. "I think that's enough for today, ready Tatsumi?"

"Yeah!" He said as he sheathed his blade.

The two were walking back doing their usual banter while you were feeling Leone's steps more gentle, whatever happened outside must be over. You still feel her soft squishy sole with each step your captor took, but it was better than the stomping she was doing earlier. With every step she wiggled her toes, your face was met with the crevice, you tasted her sweat and it was more disgusting than her pit sweat.

*STOMP!*

"Were back!" Leone said, her rank scent was even more so forcing the other members to cover their nostrils.

Lubbock on the other hand was fighting not to drool.

"Good to see you two return from your training, how's our new friend doing?" Najenda looked to Leone.

Leone giggled and wiggled her toes. She felt you struggle and not a single bone out of place. "He's still in one piece but definitely in need of a bath. Here that little guy?" She shook her right boot a bit. "You get to take a bath with me, you'll wash my feet, my pits and other places." Leone cooed to you.

You heard every word and blushed. This girl's gonna make you pass out!

Lubbock started drooling "SO LUCKY!"

Mine bonked Lubbock on the head making him fall over. "What did we tell you about drooling!"

"That's fine but keep a tight leash, don't take your eyes off of him." Najenda warned.

"Got ya boss!" She gave her a thumbs up and started leaving for the springs she uses for bathing.

"Now then it looks like our little friend had a few more books." She addressed the rest of night raid showing more books from the second compartment of your backpack. What looked like a bunch of manga, like "300", "Maze Runner", "Harry Potter", and "Hunger Games."

Meanwhile with Leone and you...
115111111111.title: Continue I

1151111111111.content:
Leone sat down by the edge of the springs and popped her boots off with a sigh and tossed them aside. "Ahhhh..now THAT feels good! Hope you're alright lil' guy!" Leone looked down at her foot and saw you plastered to the ball of it with your face still snugly in her crevice. "Wheeew! I don't envy you in the least!" she peeled you off, where you immediately gasped for fresh air.

Your eyes widened as you figured out where you were and remembered what you heard her say. "S-so are you really gonna um...bathe with me?" you blushed bright red.

"Hehe, yup, and youuu get to wash me off...you're so lucky!" She cooed and patted you on the head. "Oh y-yeah..." You blushed even more as she suddenly gripped your clothes and tore them off you. "H-hey! What are you-!?"

"Ya can't take a bath with clothes on, stupid!" She teased you. And tossed your clothes into the hot spring, "They need washed anyway...haha!" She giggled mischeviously as she smirked at you trying to cover yourself up.

"Now ya get to see me undress, ain't that exciting?" Leone teased you seductively. "I-I....I-I..I.." You stammered as she giggled and put you on the ground at the edge of the bath.

You had to admit this just got interesting, despite all the scary things that had happened today and disgusting ones too...this could be a big payoff. Besides, you were starting to grow fond of this spunky buxom blond girl....all things considered.

That was when you looked up and noticed she had discarded her clothes and she was standing there in all her nude buxom glory. You immediately had a nosebleed and fell backwards into the water with a cry.

Leone giggled and seductively stepped into the water, sitting down and relaxing with her elbows on the outer edge as she sighed in relaxation. "I've been looking forward to this...didn't know I'd have a little boy-toy my next bath though!" Leone laughed as you surfaced with a gasp and coughing.

You looked up at Leone's huge form looming over you like...like a.

"G-Goddess...!" You yelled....not realizing you had said it so loudly until after.
